IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO PROVIDE FINANCIAL SUPPORT FOR THE LOUISVILLE ZOO FOR TEACHING, RESEARCH AND SERVICE PROGRAMS, THE CONSTRUCTION OF EXHIBITS AND DISPLAYS AND THE PURCHASE OF EQUIPMENT AND SUPPLIES FOR THE ANIMALS OF THE LOUISVILLE ZOO.
IRS990.MissionDesc: TO PROVIDE FINANCIAL SUPPORT FOR THE LOUISVILLE ZOO FOR TEACHING, RESEARCH AND SERVICE PROGRAMS, THE CONSTRUCTION OF EXHIBITS AND DISPLAYS AND THE PURCHASE OF EQUIPMENT AND SUPPLIES FOR THE ANIMALS OF THE LOUISVILLE ZOO.
IRS990.Desc: TO BENEFIT AND FURTHER THE DEVELOPMENT OF THE LOUISVILLE ZOO BY PROVIDING FINANCIAL SUPPORT FOR TEACHING, RESEARCH, AND SERVICE PROGRAMS, THE CONSTRUCTION OF EXHIBITS AND DISPLAYS, AND THE PURCHASE OF EQUIPMENT AND SUPPLIES FOR THE ANIMALS OF THE LOUISVILLE ZOO.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE LOUISVILLE ZOO FOUNDATION CONTRACTED WITH A LOBBYING GROUP TO MEET WITH ELECTED OFFICIALS IN ORDER TO LOBBY FOR APPROPRIATION OF FUNDS FOR THE LOUISVILLE ZOOLOGICAL GARDENS.

LOUISVILLE ZOO FOUNDATION, INC., QUALIFIES AS A TAX EXEMPT ORGANIZATION UNDER SECTION 501(C)(3) OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE (IRC) AND, ACCORDINGLY, NO PROVISION FOR FEDERAL AND STATE INCOME TAXES HAS BEEN MADE IN THESE STATEMENTS. THE FOUNDATION ACCOUNTING POLICY PROVIDES THAT A TAX EXPENSE/BENEFIT FROM AN UNCERTAIN TAX POSITION MAY BE RECOGNIZED WHEN IT IS MORE LIKELY THAN NOT THAT THE POSITION WILL BE SUSTAINED UPON EXAMINATION, INCLUDING RESOLUTION OF ANY RELATED APPEALS OR LITIGATION PROCESSES, BASED ON THE TECHNICAL MERITS. MANAGEMENT BELIEVES THE FOUNDATION HAS NO UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS RESULTING IN AN ACCRUAL OF TAX EXPENSE OR BENEFIT. THE FOUNDATION'S FEDERAL RETURN OF ORGANIZATION EXEMPT FROM INCOME TAX, FORM 990, IS SUBJECT TO EXAMINATION BY THE TAXING AUTHORITIES UNTIL THE EXPIRATION OF THE RELATED STATUES OF LIMITATIONS ON THE RETURN, WHICH IS GENERALLY THREE YEARS.

RecipientBusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: SOUTHEAST ZOO ALLIANCE FOR REPRODUCTION AND CONSERVATION

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE TREASURER REVIEWS AND APPROVES FORM 990 PRIOR TO FILING WITH THE IRS. IN ADDITION, A COPY OF THE 990 IS PROVIDED TO ALL BOARD MEMBERS FOR REVIEW PRIOR TO FILING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ALL BOARD MEMBERS ARE REQUIRED TO COMPLETE THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST QUESTIONNAIRE UPON JOINING THE BOARD.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FOUNDATION MAKES ITS ORGANIZATION DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST.

PROFESSIONAL SERVICES: PROGRAM SERVICE EXPENSES 3,201. MANAGEMENT AND GENERAL EXPENSES 71,836. FUNDRAISING EXPENSES 0. TOTAL EXPENSES 75,037. CONTRACTORS: PROGRAM SERVICE EXPENSES 160,604. MANAGEMENT AND GENERAL EXPENSES 0. FUNDRAISING EXPENSES 0. TOTAL EXPENSES 160,604.

IdRelatedTaxExemptOrgGrp.PrimaryActivitiesTxt: OPERATE THE STATE ZOO OF KENTUCKY
